```{r}

```

```{r}
# 1. check data for errors, select cols 1 and 15:
urch <- inspect(urchins.rd, 1, 15) 
# 2. automatically determine linear segment:
rate <- auto_rate(urch)
# 3. convert units
out <- convert_rate(rate, "mg/l", "s", "mg/h/kg", 0.6, 0.4)

```
